GSD.description:
rcu: Avoid triggering strict-GP irq-work when RCU is idle

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.3 by commit 24ab8d9e694c3178a9290831235f28880a40cddd. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: rcu: Avoid triggering strict-GP irq-work when RCU is idle
